summary:
I am a Visual Artist specialized in 3D & Motion Design with an untraditional path. I have a science and master degree in Landscape Architecture that is reflected in my personal work and endeavours. I always had too many passions, living them intensely and feeling that choosing one would be too boring for a lifetime.

From Portugal, Hyper Island alumni and based in Amterdam, I've been working with brands like Adidas, joined tech collectives like Zesbaans, worked on light performances for Falco Benz during Amsterdam Dance Event and other clients combining branding guidelines with motion. In the future I want to collaborate with teams exploring Virtual Reality for mental health. I balance my work life with hobbies that don't require a screen, such as embroidery and crochet, crafts I learned at a young age. I'm prototyping for the next products after having successfully developed the first products.

After being diagnosed with an "unspecified neurodevelopmental disorder - with traits of ADD and autism spectrum disorder (ASS)" I can better understand my mind and find my mission. Normality is overrated and that's the biggest problem in this world is lack of empathy and respect for one another. She's an advocate for inclusion based on neurotypes and I'm taking action on demystifying normality.

Areas of expertise:
- Concept Development, Motion Design, Animation, Interior Design, Product Design Visualisation, Brand Strategy, Project Management, Production, Client Management, Social Media Strategy. 
- 3D Product Visualisation, 3D Cloth Simulation, 3D Modelling, 3D Sculpting, 3D Illustration, 3D Concept Development, Texturing, UV Mapping, Projection Mapping, Octane Rendering, Animation, Video Editing, Sound FX, 3D Printing.

Software:
Clo3D, Blender, Octane, After Effects, Photoshop, Premiere and Illustrator.

treasury_media.title: COLLECTION
treasury_media.description: Peter Clark is a San Francisco based skateboarder, drummer and multi-media artist. Using Cinema 4D brings out his passion for shiny objects and psychedelic color schemes. I'm a visual artist / musician still unsure of what my style is, so it took a...

treasury_media.title: NU
treasury_media.description: In Portuguese, NU means "naked". In Swedish and Dutch it means "now". NU is a collaboration between visual artists Inês Leite and Ágata Alencoão that reflects about the female image and feminism.

treasury_media.title: KPN Grow
treasury_media.description: KPN Grow it's a Make 'em Say project that I worked on together with Max Van Gorkum done while working at this studio.

treasury_media.title: Long For The Light - Falco Benz visuals ADE15
treasury_media.description: Falco Benz visuals for his performances starring at Amsterdam Dance Event '15. This is part of a project developed together with Max Italiaander (Maxmana) from concept to implementation. Falco wanted to keep the analogue feeling and a Bauhaus inspired aesthetic. This was my part on the project.

treasury_media.title: Kinesthesia
treasury_media.description: What is KINESTHESIA? KINESTHESIA started as a Hyper Island student's group project. It is an interactive audio-visual experiment developed for the exhibition Fluorescent Space Vibration in October 2014. The word "kinesthesia" refers to the perception of movements of one's body; it's relationship to, not only it's limbs and muscles, but also the space and objects around it.

treasury_media.title: Bob's Balloon
treasury_media.description: First animation project at FGreat Motion Graphics Studio, London, UK.

projects.title: KINESTHESIA
projects.description:
Installation for the Fluorescent Space Vibration Exhibition - A Hyper Island Student Project. The brief was to "explore motion" and technology, go crazy, break boundaries and step out of our comfort zones. 
We created an installation where participants can create sound and visuals using physical movement. 
Our project got sponsorship from Philips. 
The exhibition was a huge success with over 1000 visitors during 4 hours!

projects.title: Azulejo
projects.description:
Azulejo is an animated collection that merges the fourth dimension with traditional art, inspired by Portuguese tiles and blue skies.

It featured at For Film Sake festival 2017, Sydney (AU).

projects.title: Falco Benz for ADE '15
projects.description:
Visuals for Falco Benz live performances at Amsterdam Dance Event '15 and beyond. Project developed with Max Italiaander aka Maxmana.

Falco wanted to merge the analogue feeling of his music with a Bauhaus inspired aesthetic. Two screens where placed on stage to project the visuals (see photo on the side during his performance at Sugarfactory). Long For The Light concept and animation was my part in this project. 

My roles: Art Direction, 3D, 2D Animation, Video Editing for Long For The Light

Working with AutoCAD and Photoshop.
